Thanks ABC15 for coming out a visit my Young @ heART painting class at Courtyard Towers Senior Living!

Working with me people discover how easy it can be to create your own happiness.Sharing art and creativity is a process that leads to the realization that we are the creators of our own lives and that we can choose and even paint the joy we want to experience. Hi I'm Tiffiny and I love creativity! I am a mixed media artist. I live in Mesa, Arizona with; cats, dogs, chickens, rabbits, turkey, goats and a couple of awesome humans. Paint Yourself Happy is my motto and it motivates me every day share my passion for art and creativity.
710 W Broadway Rd. Warehouse #507 Mesa Az 85210

Inspire Farms OrganicNon-GMO Feed and other creative things for your farm. We believe that organic backyard farming and micro-sustainability is key to good health and an avenue to happiness and wellbeing.Apparently, we have a thing for chickens…and we learned quickly that buying Organic, Non-GMO Feed was expensive and a hassle. We wanted to go pick it up when we needed it, on our schedule. We wanted buying organic feed to be easy.This is how we ended up with a tiny feed store, open just a few hours a day with lots of by appointment flexibility!
Do You Feed Your Girls Organic?
Do You Feed Your Girls Organic?
My students at the CYT have become my artist friends. We all look forward to our creative Wednesdays where we paint, art journal and explore different techniques and an occasional open studio.

Tiffiny Lilley has been active in real estate business since 2002 and licensed in the State of Arizona, as an ePro real estate agent since 2005. She has built a solid reputation for delivering a high quality level of service. She is a member of The National Association of REALTORS® and The South East Valley Regional Association of Realtors® and the Sedona Valley Verde Association of Realtors®. She is associated with R. E. Lockman & Company in Gilbert Arizona.

Web Design, Project ManagementProviding full-service web hosting and custom WordPress website design to clients across the country. Services include WordPress blog design, SEO - search engine optimization, website maintenance, hosting, domain registration and email marketing.
Real Estate Professional focusing in residential resale for real estate investors.
Provided inside sales support for sales team, including: hiring and managing in-house cold call staff, bulk mail marketing campaigns and weekly wine and cheese presentation.
Owner/manager of a small deli and juice bar restaurant in Coronado California.
Graphic design, logo design, typography and photography.
Graphic design, logo design, typography and photography.
